name: Orthopaedics
shortintro: Orthopaedics focuses on injuries and diseases of the body’s musculoskeletal system. This includes bones, joints, ligaments, tendons, muscles and nerves.

name: Cardiology
shortintro: Cardiology is a branch of medicine dealing with disorders of the heart. The field includes medical diagnosis and treatment of congenital heart defects, coronary artery disease, heart failure, valvular heart disease and electrophysiology.

name: Ophthalmology
shortintro: Ophthalmology is the study of the anatomy, physiology and diseases of the eye. It deals with the diagnosis, treatment and prevention of diseases of the eye.

name: Gastroenterology
shortintro: Gastroenterology deals with disorders of the stomach and intestines. Candover will diagnose and manage these conditions while striving to maintain normal life and work patterns for patients.

name: Hepatobiliary & Pancreatic
shortintro: Hepatobiliary is the investigation and treatments of disorders of the liver, gallbladder, biliary trea and pancreas.

name: Gynaecology & Women’s Health
shortintro: The Gynaecology facility at Candover Clinic provides health care for conditions affecting the female reproductive system. Gynaecology is the study of the female reproductive systems.

name: Private GP
shortintro: Rapid access to general practice appointments offering advice and medical services on all common ailments.

name: Spine & Spinal Cord
shortintro: The spinal cord is made up of a large amount of nerves, these are an extension of the brain. Messages are carried from our brain to our body via these nerves.

name: Rheumatology
shortintro: Rheumatology is the study and treatment of rheumatism, osteoarthritis and other disorders concerning the joints, muscles and ligaments.
